resources.string: City Of Tracy Garbage Collection Schedule
Welcome to the City of Tracy Garbage Schedule
Today is the day to get the bins out for recollection:
Today is when they are recollecting your garbabe bins, hope you put them out already:
Recycle are items such as plastic, paper, etc, etc
Yard waste include waste from mowing lawn, tree branches, plants, etc etc
Garbage is anything else that does not fit into recycle and yard waste
